🐝 BeeWell – Terms and Conditions

Last Updated: April 2025

Please read these Terms and Conditions (\Terms\) carefully before using the BeeWell mobile application (the \App\). By accessing or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms.


1. Purpose of the App
BeeWell is designed to support individuals living with diabetes and related health concerns. The app gathers data from wearable devices and manual entries to provide predictions, insights, and general advice.

⚠️ It does NOT replace professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.


2. User Responsibilities
You agree to:
• Provide accurate and honest information
• Use the App responsibly
• Seek professional advice for medical decisions


3. Privacy and Data
• Your data is handled according to our Privacy Policy
• We do NOT sell or share health data without your consent
• Data is used to personalize your experience


4. AI and Predictions Disclaimer
The AI features in BeeWell (like glucose prediction and lifestyle advice) are:
• Experimental
• Not 100% accurate
• Intended to assist, not replace medical professionals


5. Account and Security
• Keep your credentials safe
• You’re responsible for activity in your account
• Report unauthorized use immediately


6. Limitations of Liability
BeeWell is not liable for:
• Inaccurate predictions or insights
• Health issues resulting from app reliance
Always consult a doctor when in doubt.


7. Changes to Terms
We may update these Terms occasionally. Continuing to use the app means you agree to any updates.


8. Contact Us
Questions or support? Reach us at:
support@beewellapp.com
